translations: n.后进生；学校学习成绩低于智商的学生

phrs.translation: 差等生, 后进生, 低成就者, 学困生

sentences.sentence: If the solar system has an underachiever, it has to be Venus.
sentences.translation: 如果太阳系有一个后进生，那一定是金星。

sentences.sentence: He just wanted people to stop calling him disadvantaged, an underachiever.
sentences.translation: 他就是想要人们别再叫他贫穷的失败者。

sentences.sentence: She will never gain weight, she will become a metabolic underachiever.
sentences.translation: 她永远不会发胖，只是新陈代谢不足。
